abstract: Vision Festival, which presents experimental jazz, launches fund-raising campaign after losing support from several major sponsors.
lead_paragraph: The festival, hosted by Arts for Art at Judson Memorial Church, is running a fund-raising campaign since it lost support from several key outlets.

headline.main: Vision Festival Is on a Mission to Perform This Summer
headline.print_headline: Vision Festival Is Looking for Money

snippet: The festival, hosted by Arts for Art at Judson Memorial Church, is running a fund-raising campaign since it lost support from several key outlets.
